25 #ifndef __mqtt_thread_queue_h
26 #define __mqtt_thread_queue_h
27 
28 #include <thread>
29 #include <mutex>
30 #include <condition_variable>
31 #include <limits>
32 #include <deque>
33 #include <queue>
34 #include <algorithm>
35 
36 namespace mqtt {
37 
39 
67 template <typename T, class Container=std::deque<T>>
68 class thread_queue
69 {
70 public:
72  using container_type = Container;
74  using value_type = T;
76  using size_type = typename Container::size_type;
77 
79  static constexpr size_type MAX_CAPACITY = std::numeric_limits<size_type>::max();
80 
81 private:
83  mutable std::mutex lock_;
85  std::condition_variable notEmptyCond_;
87  std::condition_variable notFullCond_;
89  size_type cap_;
91  std::queue<T,Container> que_;
92 
94  using guard = std::lock_guard<std::mutex>;
96  using unique_guard = std::unique_lock<std::mutex>;
97 
98 public:
102  thread_queue() : cap_(MAX_CAPACITY) {}
108  explicit thread_queue(size_t cap) : cap_(std::max<size_type>(cap, 1)) {}
114  bool empty() const {
115  guard g(lock_);
116  return que_.empty();
117  }
122  size_type capacity() const {
123  guard g(lock_);
124  return cap_;
125  }
132  void capacity(size_type cap) {
133  guard g(lock_);
134  cap_ = cap;
135  }
140  size_type size() const {
141  guard g(lock_);
142  return que_.size();
143  }
150  void put(value_type val) {
151  unique_guard g(lock_);
152  if (que_.size() >= cap_)
153  notFullCond_.wait(g, [=]{return que_.size() < cap_;});
154  bool wasEmpty = que_.empty();
155  que_.emplace(std::move(val));
156  if (wasEmpty) {
157  g.unlock();
158  notEmptyCond_.notify_one();
159  }
160  }
167  bool try_put(value_type val) {
168  unique_guard g(lock_);
169  size_type n = que_.size();
170  if (n >= cap_)
171  return false;
172  que_.emplace(std::move(val));
173  if (n == 0) {
174  g.unlock();
175  notEmptyCond_.notify_one();
176  }
177  return true;
178  }
188  template <typename Rep, class Period>
189  bool try_put_for(value_type* val, const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period>& relTime) {
190  unique_guard g(lock_);
191  if (que_.size() >= cap_ && !notFullCond_.wait_for(g, relTime, [=]{return que_.size() < cap_;}))
192  return false;
193  bool wasEmpty = que_.empty();
194  que_.emplace(std::move(val));
195  if (wasEmpty) {
196  g.unlock();
197  notEmptyCond_.notify_one();
198  }
199  return true;
200  }
211  template <class Clock, class Duration>
212  bool try_put_until(value_type* val, const std::chrono::time_point<Clock,Duration>& absTime) {
213  unique_guard g(lock_);
214  if (que_.size() >= cap_ && !notFullCond_.wait_until(g, absTime, [=]{return que_.size() < cap_;}))
215  return false;
216  bool wasEmpty = que_.empty();
217  que_.emplace(std::move(val));
218  if (wasEmpty) {
219  g.unlock();
220  notEmptyCond_.notify_one();
221  }
222  return true;
223  }
230  void get(value_type* val) {
231  unique_guard g(lock_);
232  if (que_.empty())
233  notEmptyCond_.wait(g, [=]{return !que_.empty();});
234  *val = std::move(que_.front());
235  que_.pop();
236  if (que_.size() == cap_-1) {
237  g.unlock();
238  notFullCond_.notify_one();
239  }
240  }
247  value_type get() {
248  unique_guard g(lock_);
249  if (que_.empty())
250  notEmptyCond_.wait(g, [=]{return !que_.empty();});
251  value_type val = std::move(que_.front());
252  que_.pop();
253  if (que_.size() == cap_-1) {
254  g.unlock();
255  notFullCond_.notify_one();
256  }
257  return val;
258  }
267  bool try_get(value_type* val) {
268  unique_guard g(lock_);
269  if (que_.empty())
270  return false;
271  *val = std::move(que_.front());
272  que_.pop();
273  if (que_.size() == cap_-1) {
274  g.unlock();
275  notFullCond_.notify_one();
276  }
277  return true;
278  }
289  template <typename Rep, class Period>
290  bool try_get_for(value_type* val, const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period>& relTime) {
291  unique_guard g(lock_);
292  if (que_.empty() && !notEmptyCond_.wait_for(g, relTime, [=]{return !que_.empty();}))
293  return false;
294  *val = std::move(que_.front());
295  que_.pop();
296  if (que_.size() == cap_-1) {
297  g.unlock();
298  notFullCond_.notify_one();
299  }
300  return true;
301  }
312  template <class Clock, class Duration>
313  bool try_get_until(value_type* val, const std::chrono::time_point<Clock,Duration>& absTime) {
314  unique_guard g(lock_);
315  if (que_.empty() && !notEmptyCond_.wait_until(g, absTime, [=]{return !que_.empty();}))
316  return false;
317  *val = std::move(que_.front());
318  que_.pop();
319  if (que_.size() == cap_-1) {
320  g.unlock();
321  notFullCond_.notify_one();
322  }
323  return true;
324  }
325 };
326 
328 // end namespace mqtt
329 }
330 
331 #endif // __mqtt_thread_queue_h
